Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax

Other Equity Adjustments: adjustments to additional paid in capital dividends in excess of retained earnings
adjustments to additional paid in capital other

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value other
Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value
retained earnings share based payment arrangement dividend equivalent units accrual
retained earnings share based payment arrangement increase for cost recognition

Stock Repurchases: treasury stock value acquired cost method
__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
preferred stock dividends per share declared
